procedure.name: Search
procedure.action: SELECT distinct Course.* , Course.id as course_id , Course.name as course_name , Course.name_ar as course_name_ar , [CourseType].[name] as course_type_name FROM [coursesplatformd].[dbo].[CourseTag] , [coursesplatformd].[dbo].[Course] , [coursesplatformd].[dbo].[CourseType] where [coursesplatformd].[dbo].[CourseTag].course_id = [coursesplatformd].[dbo].[Course].id AND [Course].[course_type_id]= [CourseType].[id] AND [coursesplatformd].[dbo].[CourseTag].[soundex] in ({0});
